Room.Name: Goblin Underground Hall
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a pitch dark passage near the western area of the goblin shrine.
Room.LongDescription: Your footsteps echo hollowly on hard stone as you make your way slowly down the corridor. It's difficult to tell just how big the passageway might be, because you cannot see from edge to edge. You pass several doors as you walk as quietly as possible through this strange area. Oddly, it sounds like snoring is coming from the doorway on the west side.
